rule.message: NullPointerException을 throw하는 것은 비추천
rule.name: AvoidThrowingNullPointerException
rule.description: Avoid throwing a NullPointerException - it's confusing because most people will assume that the virtual machine threw it. Consider using an IllegalArgumentException instead; this will be clearly seen as a programmer initiated exception.

rule.message: 가공되지 않은 Exception을 throw하는 것은 비추천
rule.name: AvoidThrowingRawExceptionTypes
rule.description: Avoid throwing certain exception types. Rather than throw a raw RuntimeException, Throwable, Exception, or Error, use a subclassed exception or error instead.

rule.message: null 값과 비교하기 위해 equals 함수를 사용하였음.
rule.name: EqualsNull
rule.description: Newbie programmers sometimes get the comparison concepts confused and use equals() to compare to null.

rule.name: VariableNamingConventions
rule.description: A variable naming conventions rule - customize this to your liking. Currently, it checks that final variables should be all caps and non-final variables should not include underscores.

rule.message: ''{0}'' 처럼 파라미터 값을 직접 변경하지 말것
rule.name: AvoidReassigningParameters
rule.description: Reassigning values to parameters is a questionable practice. Use a temporary local variable instead.

rule.message: 필요없는 Instance가 생성되어 있음
rule.name: StringInstantiation
rule.description: Avoid instantiating String objects; this is usually unnecessary.

rule.message: Abstract Class내에 Abstract Method가 존재하지 않음
rule.name: AbstractClassWithoutAbstractMethod
rule.description: The abstract class does not contain any abstract methods. An abstract class suggests an incomplete implementation, which is to be completed by subclasses implementing the abstract methods. If the class is intended to be used as a base class only (not to be instantiated direcly) a protected constructor can be provided prevent direct instantiation.

rule.message: 피연산자내에 할당문이 사용됨.Code 를 복잡하고 가독성이 떨어지게 만듬
rule.name: AssignmentInOperand
rule.description: Avoid assignments in operands; this can make code more complicated and harder to read.

rule.message: static 필드의 안전하지않은 사용 가능성
rule.name: AssignmentToNonFinalStatic
rule.description: Identifies a possible unsafe usage of a static field.

rule.message: 배열의 값을 루프문을 이용하여 복사하는 것 보다 System.arraycopy() 메소드를 이용하여 복사하는 것이 효율적이며 수행 속도가 빠름
rule.name: AvoidArrayLoops
rule.description: Instead of copying data between two arrays, use System.arrayCopy method

rule.message: Interface는 클래스의 behavior 을 구현하는 데에만 사용해야 함.
rule.name: AvoidConstantsInterface
rule.description: An interface should be used only to model a behaviour of a class: using an interface as a container of constants is a poor usage pattern.

rule.message: mothod 레벨의 synchronization 보다 block 레벨 synchronization 을 사용하는 것이 바람직함
rule.name: AvoidSynchronizedAtMethodLevel
rule.description: Method level synchronization can backfire when new code is added to the method. Block-level synchronization helps to ensure that only the code that needs synchronization gets it.

rule.message: 내용이 없는 Catch Block이 존재
finally block이 비어있음
rule.name: EmptyFinallyBlock
rule.description: Avoid empty finally blocks - these can be deleted.

rule.message: 빈 if 구문의 사용을 피하도록 함
rule.name: EmptyIfStmt
rule.description: Empty If Statement finds instances where a condition is checked but nothing is done about it.

rule.message: 필요없는 문장 (;)이 있음
rule.name: EmptyStatementNotInLoop
rule.description: An empty statement (aka a semicolon by itself) that is not used as the sole body of a for loop or while loop is probably a bug. It could also be a double semicolon, which is useless and should be removed.

rule.message: 내용이 없는 try 블록이 존재함
rule.name: EmptyTryBlock
rule.description: Avoid empty try blocks - what's the point?

rule.message: 빈 While 구문이 사용되었음.
rule.name: EmptyWhileStmt
rule.description: Empty While Statement finds all instances where a while statement does nothing. If it is a timing loop, then you should use Thread.sleep() for it; if it's a while loop that does a lot in the exit expression, rewrite it to make it clearer.

rule.message: final field를 Static 으로 변경하면 overhead 를 줄일 수 있음.
rule.name: FinalFieldCouldBeStatic
rule.description: If a final field is assigned to a compile-time constant, it could be made static, thus saving overhead in each object

rule.message: 생성자에서 Assign된 변수 ''{0}'' 를 Final로 선언하지 않았음
rule.name: ImmutableField
rule.description: Identifies private fields whose values never change once they are initialized either in the declaration of the field or by a constructor. This aids in converting existing classes to immutable classes.

rule.message: 동일 패키지에 있을 때는 import문을 사용할 필요가 없음
rule.name: ImportFromSamePackage
rule.description: No need to import a type that's in the same package.

rule.message: Empty String 을 체크하기 위해 String.trim().length() 을 사용하는 것은 피하도록 함
rule.name: InefficientEmptyStringCheck
rule.description: String.trim().length() is an inefficient way to check if a String is really empty, as it creates a new String object just to check its size. Looping through a string, checking Character.isWhitespace() on each character and returning false if a non-whitespace character is found is preferable

rule.message: StringBuffer 함수에서 nonliteral 을 직접 concatenate 하지 말 것
rule.name: InefficientStringBuffering
rule.description: Avoid concatenating non literals in a StringBuffer constructor or append().

rule.message: non-field 이름이 m_ 으로 시작함.
rule.name: MisleadingVariableName
rule.description: Detects when a non-field has a name starting with 'm_'. This usually indicates a field and thus is confusing.

rule.message: SimpleDateFormat 인스턴스를 생성할때 Locale 을 지정하는 것이 바람직함
rule.name: SimpleDateFormatNeedsLocale
rule.description: Be sure to specify a Locale when creating a new instance of SimpleDateFormat.

rule.message: boolean 사용 시 불필요한 비교 연산을 피하도록 함
rule.name: SimplifyBooleanExpressions
rule.description: Avoid unnecessary comparisons in boolean expressions - this makes simple code seem complicated.

rule.message: String 객체에서 toString()함수를 사용하는 것은 불필요함
rule.name: StringToString
rule.description: Avoid calling toString() on String objects; this is unnecessary

rule.message: Switch구문에는 반드시 default label이 있어야 함
rule.name: SwitchStmtsShouldHaveDefault
rule.description: Switch statements should have a default label.

rule.message: 빈 Method에 주석을 추가할것
rule.name: UncommentedEmptyMethod
rule.description: Uncommented Empty Method finds instances where a method does not contain statements, but there is no comment. By explicitly commenting empty methods it is easier to distinguish between intentional (commented) and unintentional empty methods.
rule.example: public void doSomething() { }

rule.message: 기본 데이터(primitive type)를 String으로 변환할 때 불필요한 임시 변환 작업을 피하도록 함
rule.name: UnnecessaryConversionTemporary
rule.description: Avoid unnecessary temporaries when converting primitives to Strings

rule.message: 괄호가 없어도 되는 상황에서 불필요한 괄호를 사용할 경우 마치 메소드 호출처럼 보여서 소스 코드의 가독성을 떨어뜨릴 수 있음.
rule.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
rule.description: Sometimes expressions are wrapped in unnecessary parentheses, making them look like a function call.

rule.message: 불필요한 Wrapper Object가 생성되었음.
rule.name: UnnecessaryWrapperObjectCreation
rule.description: Parsing method should be called directy instead.

property.name: xpath

rule.message: ''{1}'' 처럼 사용되지 않는 ''{0}'' 파라미터가 있음
rule.name: UnusedFormalParameter
rule.description: Avoid passing parameters to methods or constructors and then not using those parameters.

rule.message: 사용되지 않는 Private field ''{0}'' 가 선언되었음
rule.name: UnusedPrivateField
rule.description: Detects when a private field is declared and/or assigned a value, but not used.

rule.message: 사용되지 않는 Private Method ''{0}'' 가 선언되었음
rule.name: UnusedPrivateMethod
rule.description: Unused Private Method detects when a private method is declared but is unused.

rule.message: String 을 append 할 경우, String.valueOf 함수를 사용할 필요 없음.
rule.name: UselessStringValueOf
rule.description: Use valueOf() argument directly.

rule.message: 중괄호없이 사용된 while문의 사용은 피하라
rule.name: WhileLoopsMustUseBraces
rule.description: Avoid using 'while' statements without using curly braces

rule.message: ''{0}'' import문이 중복 선언 되었음
rule.name: DuplicateImports
rule.description: Avoid duplicate import statements.

rule.message: System.out.print 가 사용됨.
rule.name: SystemPrintln
rule.description: System.(out|err).print is used, consider using a logger.
